title: MLB Playoffs Are Set as Cardinals Clinch NL Central on Final Day of the Season
text:
It took until the final day of the regular season, but the St. Louis Cardinals secured the National League Central crown for the first time since 2015. Their 9-0 rout of the Chicago Cubs on Sunday officially clinched the division title, ensuring that the Cardinals would stave off the surging Milwaukee Brewers and avoid a tiebreaker Monday.

The Cardinals moved into first place on Aug. 23 and never lost their lead, despite a ferocious push by the Brewers, who looked like an unlikely postseason entrant just a few weeks ago. With...
description: The MLB playoffs begin on Tuesday with the NL wild-card game, with the AL wild-card game on Wednesday.
